author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND THAT KIKO CONTINUES TO WEAKEN... ...EXPECTED TO PASS NORTH OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS ON TUESDAY AND WEDNESDAY...
summary: ...AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND THAT KIKO CONTINUES TO WEAKEN... ...EXPECTED TO PASS NORTH OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS ON TUESDAY AND WEDNESDAY... As of 11:00 AM HST Sun Sep 07 the center of Kiko was located near 18.1, -145.5 with movement WNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 974 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...AIR FORCE RESERVE HURRICANE HUNTERS FIND THAT KIKO CONTINUES TO WEAKEN... ...EXPECTED TO PASS NORTH OF THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS ON TUESDAY AND WEDNESDAY... As of 11:00 AM HST Sun Sep 07 the center of Kiko was located near 18.1, -145.5 with movement WNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 974 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Kiko (CP4/EP112025)
